text.text: The Lost Worlds is a dinosaur passion project made by Willatendo, and made possible my all the amazing modelers and of course the fans.

This book is an in-depth look at everything to do with the Lost Worlds mod! From the world changes to creating your first creature, this book is the perfect place to start if you have absolutly no idea where to begin. The first few pages of each chapter will be a broader overview of features in the section, with the ensuing pages being in depth and filled with details.
